lines.text: [last lines]
Temptations... Forever
I'm the one sellin' the records. They're comin' to see me.
They're comin' to see the Temptations.

Ain't nobody comin' to see you, Otis! You wish you could work it the way I do, but you can't! Because there is only one David Ruffin. And without him, the Temps ain't nothin' but a group in SEARCH of a David Ruffin. Matter of fact, I been thinkin'. We should call the group David Ruffin And The Temptations. Yeah, that sound good to me. Y'all beggin' me not to leave you.
[sings]
"And I refuse to let you go." Yeah, David Ruffin And The Temptations. Whatcha think?

[stands up]
That ain't never gonna happen.
[Melvin is in the hospital after being shot by a carjacker who stole his car]
He shot me, then he recognized me, and then he kicked my butt out of MY car.
Was it Ruffin?
[they both laugh]
No, Ruffin would've killed me.
[During a concert break, Paul rushes off stage into the bathroom, coughs and throws up]
That was a disaster.
Yeah, Shelly, we know. All right?
The next set's in 45 minutes. There's no way he'll be ready.
He'll be ready.
Falling down drunk doesn't get better in 45 minutes, Eddie. You know what we have to do, Otis...
No! If Paul's not on that stage, I'm not on that stage.
The Temptations are known for precision, Eddie. I don't know what that was, but that wasn't it.
What's it to you, Shelley? You ain't up there.
I might as well be. Mr. Gordy holds me responsible for everything that goes on out there.
I'm responsible for Paul.
Oh, yeah? Then where were you when he was getting plastered?
I said it. I'm not going on without Paul

[after David has jumped up on stage with the Temptations]
David, are you out of your damn mind? I will whoop your ass!

[after reading a memo firing him from the group]
Y'all are stupid! You can't fire me! I made your asses! Do you hear me? DO YOU HEAR ME? You can't do me like this! You ungrateful son of a bitches!
I'm back! I quit all that stuff, O.
I told you he was clean.
I don't care!

[takes off his glasses]
Look, I'm straight, man. Can't you see I'm straight?
He's straight. Listen to him.
I'm back in the group, O. Tell me I'm back in the group.
You ain't in this group. Don't you get it? You blew it!
The crowd went wild when he jumped on stage.
He's the one who blew it, Corn!
Paul... Corn... Blue, baby, all I'm asking y'all is for another chance. Come on now!
David, I'm sorry, but you got to go.
Get out or get carried out.
I ain't goin' nowhere! You said I was a Temp for life. How 'bout that promise, huh O?
You ain't no Temptation no more!
[Otis tries to beat up David, but Melvin holds him back]
Oh yeah, not the same but nominated for a Grammy!
Makin' a big mistake, Otis.

[to Eddie]
Ain't no one man bigger than this group. Now, you remember that.
I heard about Paul.
They got the doctors and everybody in on it.
And you next.
Me?

Yeah, you. I sang "My Girl", "Ain't Too Proud To Beg". Look what they did to me. Paul's gonna be gone and that's your boy. Shark's eatin' his own guts, Corn. And after you, ain't gonna be nothin' but O and Blue. And he gonna eat Blue, too, 'cause that's the way them types is. You better quit, save yourself some dignity.
You don't know what you're talking about, Ruff. We're supposed to be back in the studio. When Paul gets better, we got the tour.
Yeah, the tour. Hey, Corn, you bigger than them, Corn. Just like I was bigger than them. You wait till your next hit, they gonna come after you. You better leave before you get fired.
Y'all ain't the same without me.
Oh, yeah? Not the same but nominated for a Grammy!
That's mine!
No, no, that ain't you on "Cloud Nine". That's Dennis' voice!
That's mine!
No, no. That ain't you on "Cloud Nine" now that's Dennis' voice!
